tool_description: This API provides the user with up-to-date dates and timings for all the races in the ongoing F1 season.
name: F1 Race Schedule
title: F1 Race Schedule

api_list.name: Select Race based on Race Number
api_list.description: Returns the details for the race based on the race number for the track in the F1 season.

api_list.name: Select Race based on ID
api_list.description: Returns the race using the ID used in the database for each individual race.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-race-schedule.p.rapidapi.com/api/6141c76615d27e0de553b9d7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-race-schedule.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-race-schedule.p.rapidapi.com/api/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-race-schedule.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Race List
api_list.description: Lists down all the races in the schedule
